body_html: @chahld To help other people please update your comment to say where your install came from. My concern is people will think they should use CUDA 9.2 and that is not going to work with 1.11 from the official pip. Thank you for helping.
body_text: @chahld   To help other people please update your comment to say where your install came from.  My concern is people will think they should use CUDA 9.2 and that is not going to work with 1.11 from the official pip.  Thank you for helping.
body: @chahld   To help other people please update your comment to say where your install came from.  My concern is people will think they should use CUDA 9.2 and that is not going to work with 1.11 from the official pip.  Thank you for helping.
